<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/85db5475982e166ec5bb1c8c9a5c8bf062d49ed1|patch 8.1.2385: opening cmdline window with feedkeys() does not work>
patch 8.1.2385: opening cmdline window with feedkeys() does not work

Problem:    Opening cmdline window with feedkeys() does not work. (Yegappan
            Lakshmanan)
Solution:   Recognize K_CMDWIN also when ex_normal_busy is set.

attachments.title: patch 8.1.2385: opening cmdline window with feedkeys() does not work · vim/vim@85db547
attachments.text: Problem: Opening cmdline window with feedkeys() does not work. (Yegappan Lakshmanan) Solution: Recognize K_CMDWIN also when ex_normal_busy is set.
